DOC.brief_summary: All patient go ICSI ( intracytoplasmic sperm injection ) cycle Monitoring : COH ( control ovarian hyperstimulation ) monitor transvaginal sonography , dose gonadotropin adjust accord follicle size number . Triggering ovulation : three follicle reach > 18mm , endometrium triple line > 8mm , gonadotropin agonist injection stop 10,000 IU hCG ( human chorionic gonadotropin ) give . Egg collection : 34-36 hour hCG injection , embryo transfer :48-72 hour oocyte retrieval . Luteal phase support : 100 mg progesterone injection IM daily day pregnancy test pregnancy test : 15 day embryo transfer . Semen collection preparation Semen sample collect masturbation clean container , usually 2-3 day abstinence . Each sample allow liquefy least 20 min 37 °C . Semen analysis : Basic sperm parameter include sperm count , concentration , motility morphology evaluate accord World Health Organization guideline . After initial assessment , ejaculate divide three aliquot . An aliquot sample use assess sperm DNA damage , second aliquot process direct swim-up technique ( n 30 ) zeta test technique ( n 30 ) follow assessment DNA damage sample measure difference DNA damage processing technique spermatozoa third aliquot morphologically analyze manually use Spermic stain light microscope score accord WHO
DOC.brief_title: Diagnostic Value Sperm DNA Fragmentation Sperm Morphology Assisted Reproduction Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: This study carry private center IVF . The aim study determine prognostic value sperm DNA fragmentation level semen process sperm morphology predict outcome assist reproduction . 60 couple undergo ICSI cycle private center IVF . All patient go ICSI cycle . Monitoring : COH monitor transvaginal sonography , dose gonadotropin adjust accord follicle size number . Triggering ovulation : three follicle reach > 18mm , endometrium triple line 8mm , gonadotropin agonist injection stop 10,000 IU hCG give . Egg collection : 34-36 hour hCG injection , embryo transfer :48-72 hour oocyte retrieval . Luteal phase support : 100 mg progesterone injection intramuscularly daily day pregnancy test . pregnancy test : 15 day embryo transfer . Semen collection preparation . Semen sample collect masturbation clean container , usually 2-3 day abstinence . Each sample allow liquefy least 20 min 37 °C . Semen analysis : Basic sperm parameter include sperm count , concentration , motility morphology evaluate accord World Health Organization guideline . After initial assessment , ejaculate divide three aliquot . An aliquot sample use assess sperm DNA damage , second aliquot process direct swim-up technique ( n 30 ) zeta test technique ( n 30 ) follow assessment DNA damage sample measure difference DNA damage processing technique spermatozoa third aliquot morphologically analyze manually use Spermic stain light microscope score accord WHO . DNA fragmentation assay : The assessment DNA damage measure processing sample use improved version sperm chromatin dispersion test . Samples prepared analysis . stain step require evaluate prepared slide . The sample stain Diff-Quik solution , immerse slide Diff-Quik solution I ( eosinophilic ) Diff-Quik solution II ( basophilic ) 6 min , allow dry room temperature .then slide examine bright field microscope .
